summary:
As an advocate for improving the 3P (People, Processes, Planet) initiatives, I anchor on my deep knowledge across these three sectors - Communication, Energy (Natural Resources Management as a major) and Sustainability. 
Equally, I take great pride in my technology management expertise as it solidifies the connection across my 3 skills. 

I am passionate about helping organisations (starting with the people in it) build an inclusive & equitable culture, where people communicate effectively without bias & apprehension. I do this, through the #CommunicatewithTA platform. Many great stories / feedback already 😉.

As a solution oriented person, I sit on a few organizational boards where I deploy my Strategic Communication & Sustainability competencies to deliver continuous value to the stake & shareholders.

My entrepreneurial foray in Cosmetics manufacturing is where I deploy my chemistry and certified knowledge of post-partum skin management to formulate natural, safe & effective skincare products for African and Afro-centric individuals. 

I contribute to thought leadership content across Strategic Communications, Energy, Sustainability and Entrepreneurship in leading publications and regularly participate in industry-specific conferences and seminars as a speaker, while my preference remains to moderate/facilitate. 

Happy to connect, and more - if any of my skillsets is a pain-point to you and/ or your organisation - feel free to pick my brain ☺️.

profile_positions.description:
PROJECT: Deepwater Assets; Subject Matter Expert, Front End Subsurface Studies Team 
I was the Lead Project Geologist on Bonga Southwest Aparo. One of Nigeria’s largest Unitized Oil & Gas fields with a recoverable volume of ~800Mmboe (644.86Mmbbl of crude oil & condensate and 688.17bcf of natural gas reserves). Block Partners are ExxonMobil, Chevron, Total, Eni & Lukoil. Project Investment Size is ~$ 10 Billion.

𝐊𝐞𝐲 𝐀𝐜𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐡𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬:
❑ Quantified Shell’s approved 80% equity volume through detailed prospect evaluation and 3D reservoir modelling process and implemented change procedures for project rephasing from 4- phase to a 2phased development with 23 planned wells. 
❑ Delivered the BSWA Pre-Unitisation and Unitisation agreements, for equity splits and operations management. 
❑ Implemented costs Improvement efforts: long reach wells, phased farm-in, thin bed reservoirs development, in-string development, data acquisition optimization and cost, time & resource (manpower) planning. These led to a $488mln CAPEX reduction and supported a Best-In Industry (BIC) Unit development cost of ~$9.0/barrel. 
❑ Evaluated the company’s commercial decisions, providing support with technical procedures and documents. 
❑ As Health Safety Environment advisor, executed 16 management facility inspections for Shell and third-party asset integrity & EIA audits, using ISO 9000 & 14001, OHSAS 18001 standards. 
❑ Company’s Technical assurer for Hydrogen Sulphide (H2S) contamination prediction and Geohazard assessment.
